entity.description: White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders

text:
@PressSec Sooo, are you going to take back YOUR statement, that the #coronavirus wouldn't come to America?! You fail. The MAJORITY of Americans will forgo your spectacle, instead we will opt for information not calibrated in lies. You sold yourself out lady..🤷‍♀️

*Crickets...🙄🤦‍♀️
